steps.step: Combine condensed milk and peanut butter in mixer bowl; beat until smooth.
Add baking mix and vanilla; mix well.
Shape into 1-inch balls; roll in sugar.
Place 2 inches apart on ungreased cookie sheet; flatten with fork.
Bake at 375°F for 6 to 8 minutes or until light brown; do not overbake.
Cool on wire rack. Store, tightly covered, at room temperature.
